content.text: Match ends, Real Madrid 1, Manchester United 3.
Second Half ends, Real Madrid 1, Manchester United 3.
Corner,  Manchester United. Conceded by Nacho.
Attempt blocked. Wilfried Zaha (Manchester United) right footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Shinji Kagawa.
Corner,  Real Madrid. Conceded by Tyler Blackett.
Foul by Jesse Lingard (Manchester United).
Isco (Real Madrid) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Attempt missed. Wilfried Zaha (Manchester United) left footed shot from a difficult angle on the left is just a bit too high. Assisted by Jesse Lingard with a cross.
Foul by Daniel Carvajal (Real Madrid).
Luke Shaw (Manchester United) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Chicharito (Manchester United).
Sergio Ramos (Real Madrid) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Offside, Real Madrid. Gareth Bale tries a through ball, but Cristiano Ronaldo is caught offside.
Goal!  Real Madrid 1, Manchester United 3. Chicharito (Manchester United) header from the left side of the six yard box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Shinji Kagawa.
Foul by Darren Fletcher (Manchester United).
Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Pepe (Real Madrid) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Chicharito (Manchester United).
Foul by Darren Fletcher (Manchester United).
Raúl de Tomás (Real Madrid) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt missed. Chicharito (Manchester United) left footed shot from very close range misses to the left. Assisted by Jesse Lingard with a cross.
Attempt missed. Shinji Kagawa (Manchester United) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right.
Foul by Sergio Ramos (Real Madrid).
Chicharito (Manchester United) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Substitution, Real Madrid. Cristiano Ronaldo replaces Álvaro Arbeloa.
Luke Shaw (Manchester United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Gareth Bale (Real Madrid).
Offside, Manchester United. Tom Cleverley tries a through ball, but Wilfried Zaha is caught offside.
Attempt saved. Tom Cleverley (Manchester United) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top right corner.
Attempt blocked. Chicharito (Manchester United) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Luke Shaw with a cross.
Attempt saved. Chicharito (Manchester United) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Shinji Kagawa.
Foul by Wilfried Zaha (Manchester United).
Luka Modric (Real Madrid) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Isco (Real Madrid) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Isco (Real Madrid).
Chicharito (Manchester United) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Attempt missed. Raúl de Tomás (Real Madrid) header from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Gareth Bale with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Real Madrid. Conceded by Phil Jones.
Corner,  Real Madrid. Conceded by Jesse Lingard.
Corner,  Real Madrid. Conceded by Jesse Lingard.
Attempt saved. Tyler Blackett (Manchester United) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal.
Jesse Lingard (Manchester United) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Isco (Real Madrid).
Substitution, Manchester United. Jesse Lingard replaces Antonio Valencia.
Substitution, Manchester United. Chicharito replaces Wayne Rooney.
Substitution, Manchester United. Shinji Kagawa replaces Juan Mata.
Attempt missed. Pepe (Real Madrid) left footed shot from the right side of the box misses to the right following a corner.
Corner,  Real Madrid. Conceded by Luke Shaw.
Raúl de Tomás (Real Madrid) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Phil Jones (Manchester United).
Substitution, Real Madrid. Raúl de Tomás replaces Xabi Alonso because of an injury.
Gareth Bale (Real Madrid) hits the right post with a left footed shot from outside the box from a direct free kick.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Xabi Alonso (Real Madrid) because of an injury.
Álvaro Arbeloa (Real Madrid) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Luke Shaw (Manchester United).
Foul by Nacho (Real Madrid).
Wilfried Zaha (Manchester United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Wilfried Zaha (Manchester United).
Sergio Ramos (Real Madrid) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt saved. Isco (Real Madrid) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the top left corner. Assisted by Gareth Bale.
Foul by Wilfried Zaha (Manchester United).
Pepe (Real Madrid) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution, Manchester United. Tom Cleverley replaces Ander Herrera.
Second Half begins Real Madrid 1, Manchester United 2.
Substitution, Manchester United. Tyler Blackett replaces Jonny Evans.
Substitution, Manchester United. Luke Shaw replaces Ashley Young.
First Half ends, Real Madrid 1, Manchester United 2.
Offside, Real Madrid. Luka Modric tries a through ball, but Gareth Bale is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Juan Mata (Manchester United) right footed shot from the left side of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Wayne Rooney with a cross.
Foul by Daniel Carvajal (Real Madrid).
Ander Herrera (Manchester United) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Substitution, Manchester United. Wilfried Zaha replaces Danny Welbeck because of an injury.
Darren Fletcher (Manchester United) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Xabi Alonso (Real Madrid).

Goal!  Real Madrid 1, Manchester United 2. Ashley Young (Manchester United) right footed shot from long range on the left to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Michael Keane.
Attempt saved. Gareth Bale (Real Madrid) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Luka Modric with a cross.
Attempt saved. Ashley Young (Manchester United) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal.
Álvaro Arbeloa (Real Madrid) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.

Goal!  Real Madrid 1, Manchester United 1. Gareth Bale (Real Madrid) converts the penalty with a left footed shot to the bottom right corner.
Penalty Real Madrid. Gareth Bale draws a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty conceded by Michael Keane (Manchester United) after a foul in the penalty area.
Corner,  Real Madrid. Conceded by Antonio Valencia.
Goal!  Real Madrid 0, Manchester United 1. Ashley Young (Manchester United) right footed shot from the left side of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Danny Welbeck.
